titleStmt.title: Loues peereles paragon, or the attributes, and progresse of the Church A sermon preached in St. Maries in Oxford, and at Harfield in Middlesex. 1613. By Iosias Byrd.
titleStmt.author: Bird, Iosias, d. 1666.

notesStmt.note: Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: A-D⁴ [E]² .
Running title reads: The attributes, and progresse of the Church.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
